00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;

00028 #ifndef _MSC_VER
00029 #include <sys/mman.h>

00031 
00032 /*
00033  * Initialize the object to use memory-mapping to access the file.
00034  */
00035 DataGroup::DataGroup(const std::string& filename_, const DataGroupHeader& dch, void* handle_, bool loadEntireDataSetHint_)
00036 : filename(filename_), dataGroupHeader(dch), useMemoryMapping(true), handle(handle_), fileStream(0), loadEntireDataSetHint(loadEntireDataSetHint_)
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 /*
00041  * Initialize the object to use std::ifstream to access 
00042  */
00043 DataGroup::DataGroup(const std::string& filename_, const DataGroupHeader& dch, std::ifstream& ifs, bool loadEntireDataSetHint_)
00044 : filename(filename_), dataGroupHeader(dch), useMemoryMapping(false), handle(0), fileStream(&ifs), loadEntireDataSetHint(loadEntireDataSetHint_)
00045 {
00046 }
00047 
00048 /*! Returns a pointer to the DataSet object by DataSet index.
00049         *  Each call will return a new DataSet object.
00050         *  The caller should call Delete when finished with the DataSet.
00051         *
00052         *       @param dataSetIdx The index of the DataSet to return.
00053         *  @return DataSet
00054         *       @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException DataSet not found.
00055         */
00056 affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* DataGroup::DataSet(u_int32_t dataSetIdx)
00057 {
00058         DataSetHeader* dph = GenericData::FindDataSetHeader(&dataGroupHeader, dataSetIdx);
00059         if (dph)
00060         {
00061                 if (useMemoryMapping)
00062                         return new affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet(filename, *dph, handle, loadEntireDataSetHint);
00063                 else
00064                         return new affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet(filename, *dph, *fileStream, loadEntireDataSetHint);
00065         }
00066         else
00067         {
00068                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00069                 throw e;
00070         }
00071 }
00072 
00073 /*! Returns a pointer to the DataSet object by DataSet name.
00074         *  Each call will return a new DataSet object.
00075         *  The caller should call Delete when finished with the DataSet.
00076         *
00077         *       @param dataSetName The name of the DataSet to return.
00078         *  @return DataSet
00079         *       @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException DataSet not found.
00080         */
00081 affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* DataGroup::DataSet(const std::wstring& dataSetName)
00082 {
00083         DataSetHeader* dph = GenericData::FindDataSetHeader(&dataGroupHeader, dataSetName);
00084         if (dph)
00085         {
00086                 if (useMemoryMapping)
00087                         return new affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet(filename, *dph, handle, loadEntireDataSetHint);
00088                 else
00089                         return new affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet(filename, *dph, *fileStream, loadEntireDataSetHint);
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00094                 throw e;
00095         }
00096 }
